Country: Italy

Synopsis .... Vices Italiens stars Roberto Malone as a degenerate low-level mob boss who, over the course of the two parts and several sleazy scenes, plumbs increasingly desperate depths of depravity. His dissolute behaviour runs the gamut from treating his own wife (Joy Karin's) as a mere sex object to be wanked over while he guzzles wine and peruses a porn mag, and later to be sodomised against her wishes, to taking full physical recompense from the mother who asks for his intervention in her daughter's impending marriage to another unsuitable suitor. It only gets worse from there, and let me assure you that I give nothing away by saying that there's no happy ending as Salieri shows little compassion for the characters he creates
Extras.
